head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HINES, MARION E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HINES, MARION E.

block.p: HINES-Marion E. Of Boston and Marstons Mills, died on August 19, in Marstons Mills at the age of 81. Husband of Julie (Viele) Hines, of Boston and Marstons Mills; Father of Sheldon K. Hines of Concord, MA; Julian B. Hines of Boston, MA; Hadley (Hines) Chianese of Cambridge, MA; Brother of Lawrence R. Hines of Sedona, Arizona; C. Lee Hines of Morrow Bay, California. Also survived by three grandchildren. A memorial service will be held at Kings Chapel in Boston, MA at a later date. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to Friends of the Public Garden, 90 Mt Vernon St, Boston, MA 02108. Nickerson-Bourne Funeral Home 154 Rt. 6A, Sandwich, MA.
